description: High Moon Studios introduced the TRANSPROFILE format in 2010 when it released Transformers: War for Cybertron . The sequel to the game, Transformers: Fall of Cybertron , which High Moon Studios released in 2012, also uses the format.

The format is a proprietary binary format the game creates and manages automatically. While most gamers will never encounter TRANSPROFILE files, some players may back up or transfer these files to preserve their progress across devices or after reinstalling the game.
